Spy vs. spy: How GenAI is powering defenders and attackers

AI 5 min read

The article "Spy vs. Spy: How GenAI is Powering Defenders and Attackers" explores the dual role of Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI) in cybersecurity. It highlights how GenAI tools are being leveraged both to enhance security measures and to develop sophisticated cyberattacks. On the defensive side, GenAI aids in identifying vulnerabilities, predicting threats, and automating responses to enhance protection against cyber threats. Cloudflare blames today's outage on emergency React2Shell patch

Tech 5 min read

Cloudflare experienced an outage due to an emergency patch for the React2Shell vulnerability, which prompted an urgent update across its systems. The patch aimed to address a critical flaw, but it inadvertently caused disruptions in service availability for users worldwide. Cloudflare quickly identified the issue and worked to restore functionality by rolling back the changes and implementing a more stable fix. The company emphasized its commitment to security and transparency, acknowledging the inconvenience caused to customers while prioritizing the rapid resolution of such vulnerabilities.

Tech 5 min read

"The Browser Defense Playbook: Stopping the Attacks That Start on Your Screen" provides comprehensive strategies for safeguarding against threats that originate through web browsers. It details the various types of cyber attacks such as phishing, malware, and ransomware that exploit browser vulnerabilities, underscoring the critical role browsers play in daily digital activities. AI 5 min read

Imper.ai aims to leverage this capital to accelerate the development and deployment of its AI solutions, which are designed to tackle complex industry challenges by offering advanced analytics and automation capabilities.
